name: CryptoMania Alpha
description:
Welcome to CryptoMania Alpha!

Invest in crypto, profit and lose a shit ton of money!

I made this in under 100 hours.

A lot of ideas were cut and I mean a lot, so if i ever revisit this game, expect many more mechanics, such as cryptomining, data breaches, just to name a few.

So yeah... go out and crypto your way to crypto-ness! (get it because crypto stoopid)

btw if you want to reset your save just delete "save.json", i can't be stuffed to add an in-game save reset feature.

i got the sounds from myinstants LMAO i was fucking lazy

freesound is still chad love you mwah
